lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I get to make a positive difference in someone's life and also help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I know I can make a difference. I have been to Nakuru, in Kenya I know because I have seen and experienced how little can make such huge changes to a persons life. The gift of a few dollars can save a life, give encouragement, give back pride and self asteem and give back so much that we take for granted.

lenders.name: Shuntaro
lenders.loan_because: I was born in wealthy country and grown up in the family filled with love.
lenders.occupational_info: solar business

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to think I can do something to help. I see to much waste at home.
lenders.occupational_info: Pointless. I watch people throw money away.

lenders.name: Marianne and Fraser
lenders.loan_because: We are so grateful to finally have a resource that provides our family the opportunity to effectively help people from all over the world to achieve their ambitions.  Thanks Kiva for giving low income people from all over the world a voice, and asking them, instead of telling them, what they need.  Thanks for giving us this amazing opportunity to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
Marianne works in the community helping people access the resources that they need.  
Fraser is a carpenter who builds houses.
Angela is in university to study anthropology (the study of cultures).
Jessica is also in university and works at a shelter for homeless youth.

lenders.name: Robert Shepherd
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to grow themselves, their family and community. This capital just provides a small help, the loaners are the hero's of this global story.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: Omnes mundum facimus - We all make the world.

lenders.name: Ato
lenders.occupational_info: I act in movies, theater and television.

lenders.name: jos
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to start there business
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Chocolatier and work on a oldfashion way, So i have there best ingredients and don't work for the money

lenders.name: Igal Sapir
lenders.loan_because: I can and they need it to change their lives
lenders.occupational_info: Math Teacher

lenders.name: Wael
lenders.loan_because: I know that the loan will make a differnace in someone's life, and will help them make a living out of it.
lenders.occupational_info: Managing a Small loans to the most needy farmers.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because:
To give without any reward, or any notice, has a special quality of its own.
No better feeling in the world

lenders.name: Brittany
lenders.occupational_info: I sell books.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Such a little amount to me here in the UK can make such a massive difference elsewhere in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in communications and events for a London community group aimed at Social Inclusion

lenders.name: Audrey, Bryan, Nic
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy homes in Austin, TX.

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help other people improve their lives.

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: I would like others to have the same opportunities that others have graciously afforded me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help provide computer support for a plastic and cast iron pipe manufacturer.

lenders.name: TheTelf
lenders.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves seems like the only way we're ever going to get any closer to a fair, just, self-sustaining world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software that helps to improve hospital services.

lenders.name: Tonya
lenders.loan_because: I believe, together we can make a difference in the lives of many families.  Jesus said..."If you can believe, all things are possible to him who believes." Mark 9:23
lenders.occupational_info: I help nonprofit organizations earn money that they can use for any purpose.

lenders.name: Koenig
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide full time security at my home. My human works in heavy engineering.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: Because I can.

lenders.name: PAUL & JUDY
lenders.loan_because:
i)  being lucky enough to be able to make loans and
ii)  I enjoy the way Kiva work and the help they bring to many entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: Finance Director of a sliced bread making plant employing 65 people and producing about 20 million loaves of bread a year. Based in Andalucia, Southern Spain

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I want to feel that I make a difference for those who are seeking a better way of life.  Everyone should be given a chance to succeed, no matter what his/her socioeconomic status.
lenders.occupational_info: I am trained to be a librarian in the school system (grades Kindergarten through 12th).  I currently work in my church nursery while I stay at home with my 3 year old son.

lenders.name: Francisco
lenders.loan_because:
maybe i don´t need it all.

maybe i don´t need it at all.

lenders.name: Della
lenders.loan_because: We are very blessed in this country and need to extend our blessings to others in places where change is necessary and people are motivated in those countries to step up to the challenge.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: you need to give back to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Real estate agent in Los Angeles area.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: there are people all over the world who aren't as fortunate as I am.  I help simply because I can :)

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: it's powerful and fulfilling for everyone involved.
lenders.occupational_info: stressful and rewarding

lenders.name: Drury Gives Global
lenders.loan_because: We are business students that want to help entrepreneurs around the world to improve their business and their communities.  We started this fund with support from many people at our University.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I want to be the change we need to see in the world

lenders.name: Sonia
lenders.loan_because: it's an excellent way of giving back.  Empowering individuals to be the best that they can be is a rewarding experience.
lenders.occupational_info: I support my clients to make their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.occupational_info: I create art to help people learn.  I illustrate concepts and ideas to help teach students about everything from science & health to marketing & good business practices.

lenders.name: Ariel
lenders.loan_because: I prefer people learn to support themselves through business loans rather than from free handouts.

lenders.name: E.J.
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself. Plus, I believe we are all part of one global family and this helps me to feel more connected to that family.

lenders.name: MONIQUE
lenders.loan_because: it is important to help one another. We are blessed to bless others...

lenders.name: Buddy
lenders.loan_because: These loans were made by the students and professors in the Spring 2008 Semester Honors Principles of Marketing class at the University of Louisville.  The class was divided into 5 teams of students and each team selected a specific entrepreneur for a loan.  As these loans are repaid, the funds will be used to make additional loans by students taking this class in the future.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: I'm passionate about social justice and I feel like Kiva is an excellent way to reach out and make an impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently teaching English in Sapporo, Japan.  After I leave here I plan to attend graduate school and continue my studies in the field of international relations.

lenders.name: April and Joe
lenders.occupation: Mortgage Broker and Grade School Studen

lenders.name: Raphael
lenders.loan_because: I am a hedonist and it makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to paint their truest pictures.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky to live in Canada..
lenders.occupational_info: school for now...

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: In support of the United Nations Millenium Development Goals
lenders.occupational_info: I taught at university when I was younger.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I want to improve living conditions in Latin America...one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in Communications for the world's largest Ice Cream and Nutrition company. 

The guilt I feel from the ice cream is offset by the work we do on Nutrition. It's a balancing act. :)

lenders.name: Cathryn and Lenord
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to know that if we all do a little, a lot can be accomplished.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with First Nations communities to improve their access to Health services and information.

lenders.name: Ush
lenders.loan_because: Its time to lend a hand

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the State of California.  I write contracts that help keep our air clean and breathable.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It is a small way to (hopefully) make a  difference in someone's life. I joined the Japan lending group because I used to teach in Miyagi prefecture.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach art to high school students.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: Microlending is one of the best ways to start addressing the unequal distribution of resources in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to leave the world a little better than I found it.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: i care

lenders.name: Bill and Coralee
lenders.loan_because: no amount of fine feeling can take the place of faithful doing.
lenders.occupational_info: Coralee is an artist and teaches in the public schools.  Bill is a writer for Native American Natural Resources.

lenders.name: Arielle
lenders.loan_because: I want other women to prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: Sometimes fun, sometimes boring, very detail oriented.

lenders.name: Alarico
lenders.loan_because:
I grew up in Tanzania, East Africa. I am of a fortunate few that got to go to college and now lives in the U.S. I miss Africa, I love Africa. 
I loan because I want to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a student with two focuses:
Global Security (conflict analysis & Resolution)
Economics (Development Economics & International Economics)

 I am the supervisor of the Planning Division of Maintenance & Engineering at Midwest Airlines.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I have had so many advantages in my life; I just want to share with others.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I am disabled

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people around the world get closer to their dreams and there are so many great stories.
lenders.occupational_info: I create livable spaces for people to live and work in.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Authentic Jobs
lenders.loan_because: We offer job opportunities for individuals throughout the world, so we figure it's only fitting to donate a portion of our revenue to help entrepreneurs throughout the world.

lenders.name: Botterill Family
lenders.loan_because:
We like to help people.

Most of these people are hard working who just need a break to get their business going.
lenders.occupational_info:
We are a family of five living in Calgary, Alberta, Canada

Some of the charities we assist are
  www.kiva.org
  www.samaritanspurse.ca.
  www.innfromthecold.org
  www.worldvision.ca

lenders.name: M Sotherden
lenders.loan_because: I own my own stained glass studio, and I am able to be in business because I had help from a lot of people.  Kiva is my way of "paying it forward" to other people trying to live their entrepreneurial dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I make glass art (like the barrette in my photo) to sell to people all over the world.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed in my life to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of the people that run our businesses.

lenders.name: julie
lenders.loan_because: I won a KIVA gift card...pretty sweet
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a biology/environmental science major, and I plan to pursue soil science, soil conservation, soil chemistry, something with soil

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I like the transparency of Kiva.  I like knowing who my money goes to and what's being used for, rather than just throwing money at a charity and never knowing what will come of it.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone has the ability to change the world in some capacity.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at Babson College, the country's top school for Entrepreneurship.  I am also helping Mission Schools International open its first two schools in Rwanda.

lenders.name: Alisa
lenders.loan_because: "He has showed you, O man, what is good. And what does the Lord require of you? To act JUSTLY and to love MERCY and to walk HUMBLY with your God." Micah 6:8
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to live a healthier life and I coach soccer and track.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.occupational_info: Educating my community about the world, its people, its culture, its politics.

lenders.name: Eric & Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: something small to us can mean the world to others.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel like I'm anonymously helping someone.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: it amazes me how little can help another so much :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes and property.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who are working hard to promote their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students at a Catholic High school in Orange County, California

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Inequality is immoral, and makes the world unsafe for everyone.

lenders.name: bernie
lenders.loan_because: a little bit goes a long way

lenders.name: Deanne
lenders.loan_because:
I am blessed to have the help and support I have needed throughout life to live well, dream big and to pursue my goals. Every person on earth deserves the same; and I believe each of us can be an earth guardian angel to persons everywhere.  We can all extend ourselves in some small way to be the break , the hope, that someone somewhere needs to make their life better and to pursue their dreams.
Every good deed makes the world greater. 
This organization is a prime example of the reality and the innate goodness of that movement. 
Bravo Kiva.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Helping people, in big ways or small, puts a smile on my face and makes the world a better place.

lenders.name: K. Marcus
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of giving that is not "charity" nor promotes dependency.  Lending does not foster dependency but rather fosters independence, interdependence and hard work.  This builds pride and self-esteem.
lenders.occupational_info: I attempt to be of service to people by listening and bearing witness to their suffering.  We discuss their problems and work  toward solutions.  I encourage strength, self-sufficiency and community.  I feel very honored to be able to do this type of work.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: hmmm, night out or change a life for the better... damn that was easy to answer
lenders.occupational_info: i am paid to give people money all day long, and now i do it here for fun

lenders.name: Charlie Sherrod
lenders.loan_because: if I can help seed someone's dreams for a better life, what better use of my resources?
lenders.occupational_info: I make things! I develop new ideas that make a difference in the marketplace.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: prosperity and success can help people free themselves from the bondage of myth and superstition.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: If I can help others, I will.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Mayor of Orange County, Florida focusing on political and environmental issues.  The home of Disney World.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I am strong believer in microfinance, especially for women in developing countries.  It is immensely satisfying to know that I am able to have such a direct, significant impact on people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Administrator for an organization that works to promote and protect internationally recognized human rights.

lenders.name: Jerry & Sue
lenders.loan_because: "For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also." Gospel of Matthew 6:21

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: It is a biblical principle to loan without interest and I know it is very beneficial to the reciever
lenders.occupational_info: study of art on the computers (graphic design)

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: Its always nice to have a helping hand. Just passing it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean, feed, and take care of lots of animals at a zoo in Texas! I love my job!

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Trisha
lenders.loan_because: I believe by helping others you also help yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of  other peoples children while the parents work.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected. I believe it is possible to make a difference as an individual, a little bit at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an Art School with students who are trying to work in the field of Animation and Visual Effects.

lenders.name: rocco, isabelle & simon
lenders.loan_because:
we wish that everyone in this world gets the same chance for a good life.
Further we hope that every child will profit from this project, having the probability of enough to eat an education.
lenders.occupational_info: simon is an artist, works with earth, wood,  trash etc. isabelle is a restorer of furniture and objects  made of wood

lenders.name: Mitesh
lenders.loan_because: a mere $25 could make a world of difference to a budding entrepreneur in a less privileged nation
lenders.occupational_info: Create wealth by sharing it

lenders.name: chang
lenders.loan_because: for
lenders.occupational_info: reason

lenders.name: Debraj&Sayantani
lenders.loan_because: We believe we can always take a little bit of comfort from our lives in order to help those who need it most and make a difference in this world. That makes life truly worth living

lenders.name: Nicola
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea, I think it is a good way to help people to help themselves

lenders.name: Haggai Borkow
lenders.loan_because:
"Since Auschwitz we know what man is capable of. 
And since Hiroshima we know what is at stake.
It is an exquisite joy to do what we can!"
lenders.occupational_info: Making others doubt the obvious. Or is it?

lenders.name: Matt D.
lenders.loan_because: Someone gave me a gift on Kiva.  I hope to loan more when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer to teach English to Chinese students.

lenders.name: Christofer
lenders.loan_because: I beleeve that we only help, if we help the people produce products they can afford and use in the countries they live in. With my small loan I hope to make life of some people a little better.

lenders.name: THE One Office
lenders.loan_because: We want to help Change the World together with people like you & really make the World a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: We have recently started our own foundation where by we will build schools in remote villages in developing third world countries. From these schools we will hopefully build good communities around them & give the inhabitants & their dependants an opportunity to gain an education & help them develope themselves in readiness for the future.

lenders.name: Frank and Susan
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: Just enjoying  retirement and spending time with  family!

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed with a great job and want to give others the opportunity to enjoy success and prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: My company offers financing/leasing to businesses so they can just pay a monthly payment without ownership.  This is allows companies to have the latest equipment without having to buy it again, they just continue making a monthly payment.  I also create special offers (promotions) and new financial products.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I have everything I'd ever need and through travelling, I've seen how giving a little can help someone get that extra step up in life and have more hope for the future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in retail for a big box retailer selling electrical equipment. I am responsible for marketing of specifiic items both in-store and out of home.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I think you define yourself via your acts and not by your words.  I loan to others because if the roles were reversed I would hope someone would lend to me.  I loan because it feels great.  I loan because I think it is an effective way to help others.  I loan because people need the money.
lenders.occupational_info: I help other people do their jobs better.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.occupational_info: I am an archaeologist who studies the use of the past in modern politics and political movements in South America

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: brian
lenders.loan_because: My family in Spain were'nt as privileged as we are here in the states. If i can give someone a helping hand to feed a family or make a community better then i will.
lenders.occupational_info:
I do not make a lot but enough to make myself comfortable. I work in sales. I sell contracts to Hospitals and physician groups that we will do their billing for them.

outsourced accounts recievables

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It's a darn cool thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I consult on income and property taxes.

lenders.name: Marissa
lenders.loan_because: it's not charity.  No one wants "charity", they want to earn with dignity.  Kiva gives them the initiative.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of psychology and also very involved in a community service organization.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women need to be empowered to provide a better life for their children and for themselves.  I couldn't have started my business without help and I want to pass along the gift to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in marketing to find out how to better sell products to people.

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: ... I am lucky to be able to help.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is important to know you can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean the water.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Quentin
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to help people and share the blessings I've been given.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an access administration team

lenders.name: Lois
lenders.loan_because: It is so rewarding to help someone achieve their goals.

lenders.name: ARTICULATE
lenders.loan_because: What an awesome opportunity to give others opportunities!
lenders.occupational_info: We make really cool e-learning software that anyone can use.

lenders.name: Dona
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I build, furnish, stock and staff new medical offices for physicians and hospitals.

lenders.name: Juliana
lenders.loan_because: I realise how privileged I am, and how a small sum in my world can make a huge difference in someone else's. Also, political activism is important but supporting people on the ground to build their lives is equally critical.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a London-based writer who explores questions that seize my imagination, insult my sense of fairness, and open my eyes to beauty. Work includes commentary on issues from education policy and cancer treatment to the Arab spring and the state of contemporary feminism, alongside memoir and even some poetry.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is a privilege to be able to help our neighbors.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I like that Kiva is a help-out rather than a hand-out.  I like that my money is going to be repaid, so I can help lots of people with the same initial investment.  I also like that I can hand pick who I invest in and feel that connection with that individual.  I can see exactly where my money is going and have a face to match exactly who I'm lending a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I run an upscale wine and liquor store and play bass guitar.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I belive in helping those who help themselves.  Together we can rid the world of povery.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Computers

lenders.name: laura
lenders.loan_because: Help has been there when I have needed it in the past
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from allopathic (Modern) medicine to pursue my love of herbalism, and other modalities that just make more sense to me. I sleep much better now. I strive to have a good diet, and use the best possible fuels that I can. I do a lot of herb wildcrafting, and make most of my herbal preparations.I am not active in my community, but have been working on that one. I am seen as a bit eccentric.I am a Special needs dog rescuer. I foster deaf bull dogs until they can find a forever home

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I've seen first hand how small loans dramatically improve the lives of not only the entrepreneurs, but their families and communities.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I think it is very easy to forget how lucky you are and how difficult life can be for others. Luckily I am in a position to help out in my own way to enable a few people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Business outsourcing.

lenders.name: Kupiec Family
lenders.loan_because: We care about the global community, and believe we have a social responsibility to assist other individuals where possible.
lenders.occupational_info: Pharmacist and Future physician.

lenders.name: Carl & Nachele
lenders.loan_because: Blessing others is one of the biggest blessing of all.

lenders.name: Maria Angélica
lenders.loan_because:
I will want support my family with money of my work. I believe on my qualities for this.
I just need of a chance.
With the money, we'll do a little restaurant, buy more things to cook.
lenders.occupational_info: My daughter, me and my father-in-law do candys, cakes, lunch, typical food and many other foods.

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: it's a wonderful opportunity to help people establish financial independence and foster autonomy
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor specializing in pathology.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I feel it's important to give back to communities in need. When I visited Peru in 2007, I learned first hand the struggles that many people faced and this is my small way of helping.
lenders.occupational_info: By providing an enterprise collaboration platform and web conferencing software, I assist companies improve their productivity amongst their colleagues, partners and customers.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: it is a proven way to help someone improve their quality of life.  It's good to foster the entrepreneurial spirit!
lenders.occupational_info: I have spent 25+ years in the banking industry doing a variety of things, but mostly managing all things relating to marketing communications.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple and effective way to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who have emotional and behavior disabilites.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because:
The borrowers are offering useful goods and services to their communities.  I'm impressed by how resourceful they are in environments that are much more difficult than any I've had to deal with. 

And yet, with each person, there is usually something about their business, their aspirations, their family or their circumstances that is like my own or like someone I know here.  These glimpses make the world seem smaller and friendlier.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to bring more peace to the world
lenders.occupational_info: health care

lenders.name: Alistair
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am part of a successful software business and believe by helping others to help themselves you can create sustainable economic growth.

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping entrepreneurs in developing areas.
lenders.occupational_info: I extend credit to businesses

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: I am passionate about doing something to change the world. Helping others help themselves seems like the best way to do so.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone help themselves through hard work
lenders.occupational_info: I print magazines

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to help others less fortunate than yourself. I like Kiva because it gives people the means to help themselves and not a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain and repair avionic systems for the US Air Force.

lenders.name: Jesse Krembs
lenders.loan_because: because this is one of the best ways to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with technology, computers, radios and other hackers to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Tera Eng
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back and help my native country of Cambodia.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a facilitative leader and I bring people together to solve complex business problems and/or plan for anticipated market demands.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to help my fellow business person get going with their businesses, it makes me feel happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I create web sites on the Internet for companies in the United States of America.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can make the world into a better place one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Full-time freshmen college student.

lenders.name: Solo Travel Network
lenders.loan_because: Supporting individual initiative is a step-by-step pathway to equality for every citizen of our global community.
lenders.occupational_info: International networking among people who travel without a partner.

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.occupational_info: advertising for pharmaceuticals

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others provide for their families and realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and want to give back to those who are trying hard to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired after working 15 years. I raised 5 children who are all living on their own and having families. I spend my time exploring my country from our RV. We volunteer with Habitat, building houses.

lenders.name: Allie
lenders.loan_because: I think that the work Kiva does in forging relationships all over the world to help those in need, those that otherwise might not have the access to resources they need.

lenders.name: daniel
lenders.loan_because: i believe in freedom ,happiness and abundance of good  . if all of us would do what ever we can to help others, even if it small things that we not really thinking that can change something  , the world will be a better place for all of us with freedom, happiness and abundance.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel so good to do this - such a small amount to me, but it means so much to these entrepreneurs who are just trying to support their families.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: Lending lets me have a positive contact with people who are different from me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am what's called a "water lawyer" in the Western United States.  I represent the federal government in lawsuits to sort out who has rights to drill wells and irrigate from streams in desert areas.

lenders.name: Shawna
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people who have a true desire will make things happen.  Even with uncertain circumstances people are capable of creating miracles in their lives.  Lets help miracles happen.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, although I wish I could do more, this is a start.  Hopefully I will be able to contribute more in the future financially, or by recruiting other lenders.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a factory where I assemble automobiles.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people but in a way that is empowering to them and that will have a long-term impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the assistant to my company's CEO - I type documents, arrange his travel, organize meetings, and generally make his life easier.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to several of the countries covered by Kiva.   It was amazing to meet people like this who are working so hard to build businesses and support their families in such difficult conditions.  I want to do whatever I can to provide them opportunity to expand.
lenders.occupational_info: As a marketing professional, I shape how and to whom we sell our products as well as what the products need to be.  My work involves selling operational software to large enterprises (like credit card companies, utilities, and health care insurers).

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in a sustainable way.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to appreciate and learn about the land and themselves by helping them to experience the wilderness.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I loan because of Moopups. He was a loner who quietly changed many lives, without even knowing he was doing so. If he were still here, he would be making loans through Kiva.  Since he is not here, I loan in his memory.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I needed help for education and raise my children and I want to show my gratitude to those who helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I play and work with fiber - wool, yarn, silk, etc. - to create fashion accessories.

lenders.name: Marte
lenders.loan_because: it is is practical way to partner with women all around the world and to empower families and communities through these bold women.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: Makes me feel good
lenders.occupational_info: Provide people with a vision of financial independence.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: compared to some, work is not an appropriate description.

lenders.name: Annabelle and Daniel
lenders.loan_because: we are lucky to have all of the things that we have, and there are a lot of people out there who need this money more than we do.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both full time college students.

lenders.name: Rosena
lenders.loan_because: a small amount can make such a huge difference!

lenders.name: Sarala
lenders.loan_because: Better question...why not?

lenders.name: Asko
lenders.loan_because: Even the little I give may be someone's big break.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people access their government through the internet.

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: it's important to give back to our world economy. I believe everyone should be able to pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell men's jewelry and accessories to people all over the world.

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because: I have seen how much impact a small amount of money can make - and the structure of Kiva makes it more likely the money will be used appropriately by the entrepreneur.  I travel often to Uganda and may be able to meet some of the entrepreneurs I'm lending to... and I'm especially keen to support women who often are left with the responsibility for raising the children when husbands die or otherwise leave the family.
lenders.occupational_info: I do public health research on HIV/AIDS in Africa, mostly Uganda.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.occupational_info: I help determine the right price to charge for insurance.

lenders.name: ThomasEconClasses
lenders.occupational_info: We are students. We seek to understand how the world economy works. We also wish to participate in this economy. We do so here, as mini-venture capitalists.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: "This is how we know what love is. Jesus Christ laid down his life for us, and so we should lay down our lives for our brothers" 1 John 3:16.

lenders.name: xiaobo
lenders.loan_because: no pain,no gain. Many peoples  need some help for the sake of  alleviating poverty. So I think  I shall  doing someting.
lenders.occupational_info: business of  communicate instrument

lenders.name: Bijan
lenders.loan_because: I personally know the reality of development aid and have been to some of the countries I lend to. Kiva is the most effective way to give.
lenders.occupational_info: Project Manager in Development Aid, specialising in knowledge management and ICT4Dev.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.occupation: Office Manager for a small non-profit
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I do the paperwork for a volunteer organization that teaches people outdoor recreation skills.

lenders.name: Yudi
lenders.loan_because: I want plant jackbean for 20 ha land

lenders.name: Tessie & Philip
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist people who need microloans
lenders.occupational_info: I teach ethics

lenders.name: Karim
lenders.loan_because: if I was one of the people asking for a loan, I would be happy to have some people trusting me and helping me out.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I know I can change peoples lives without even spending money. I am just that cool!!!

lenders.name: YVES RENÉ PRIMEAU
lenders.loan_because: SUPPORT CREATIVITY AND SEL-RELIANCE
lenders.occupational_info: HELP PEOPLE RECONNECTING TO THEIR ORIGINAL LIFE ENERGY

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves. This is a very personal and tangible way of supporting small scale enterprises and developments that can have a direct impact on the wellbeing of the families involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a midwife and a nurse. I worked in the NHS for 35 years and have just started my own consultancy. I understand the struggle of starting a new business, but in England there is lots of support available. This is my way of supporting those in more difficult economies to also realise their ambitions.

lenders.name: Achim
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good idea and I hope it changes some lives for the better

lenders.name: jan
lenders.loan_because: Splendid idea
lenders.occupational_info: IT development

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because:
We as human beings are the ones on this earth responsible for creating and manifesting everything that is going on in our world today! There is and there can be enough for everyone - no one deserves or should go through difficult times, for we as human beings are responsible for allowing the humanitarian problems in the world to still continue. Corrupt systems, that keeps us humans enslaved....sick, hungry for power & money, while the real problems/issues are being ignored. We have to stop and stand up/ change our ways - as within, so without - re-create a better world for all humans/ children and start taking responsibility for ourselves and for our world! 

“In a country well governed, poverty is something to be ashamed of! In a country badly governed, wealth is something to be ashamed of!” ~Confucius~

A leader is best when people barely know he exists, not so good when people obey and acclaim him, worse when they despise him....But of a good leader who talks little when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say, "We did it ourselves.
~Lao Tzu~

lenders.name: Alexis Lauzon
lenders.loan_because: This may be the only process that can support entrepreneurs in these countries to bring a new change in their business and life.
lenders.occupational_info: "The good times of today are the sad thoughts of tomorrow"- Bob Marley

lenders.name: Muhammad Atif Ali
lenders.loan_because: I have a business trading in commuditities.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: Allah has blessed me and i want to share with those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Martin Scott
lenders.loan_because: It's cool, it helps people, and it improves my karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I help write computer programs that allow companies to display information in the Internet.

lenders.name: Elizabeth H. Ojai, CA
lenders.loan_because: My children gave me $50 to loan for my 50th birthday, I wanted to loan to someone with children. I will continue loaning with Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I develop office product  for an online store for my employer. For a hobby I have a big garden, chickens, rabbits and dogs.

lenders.name: Autumn
lenders.loan_because: There is not enough compassion and camaraderie in the world.  We're all part of one great community, and I love that Kiva offers me an opportunity to reach out to people across the globe in making a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of the solution.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help people with stress and trauma related conditions including insomnia. I have specialized training in a naturalistic stress and trauma healing method called Somatic Experiencing. This is a body centered way of gently releasing tension and stress. For sleep issues I work with individuals over a series of one-on-one sessions based on cognitive behavioral therapy for insomnia, CBT-I.  Sometimes I offer classes for general information on sleep and stress relief.

I am in Waldorf Early Childhood education in hopes of bringing my skills to youngsters and thier families.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: Everything I have came from someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I create computer programs and sell them to businesses.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: andrew
lenders.loan_because: I really want to try and save some money over the next few years and while i'm saving, I like to think it really helps someone else in the world, So thanks for helping me.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping to build houses

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I have 25% North Vietnamese heritage, 75% French, born in France in 1944, now living in the Pocono mountains of Pennsylvania, USA.  I want to participate in lifestyle improvement for those still living where my grandmother came from.

lenders.name: Samantha & Scott
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: Sales, Management and Rental of Central Florida Vacation Homes - Small Business Development

lenders.name: Paul Fairley
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to empower the economic independence of women in the developing world.

lenders.name: A.J. Smith
lenders.loan_because: I believe grass roots, individual-to-individual, economic solutions are likely far superior to major, sweeping programs administered by large organizations.  What a wonderful way to participate in changing lives through microcredit.

lenders.name: matt
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I want my children to understand the importance of giving to others everytime they can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Spanish language and culture at the college level.

lenders.name: LG
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people helping themselves. When these entrepreneurs have repaid their loans I can let someone else use the money! In this way more people can be helped to raise themselves out of poverty  to a better life.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: It's my way to give back...
lenders.occupational_info: I try to create music and share it with the world.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the little guy. He is the one that makes the world turn.
lenders.occupational_info: I create indoor comfort

lenders.name: EPO TH 13th floor
lenders.loan_because: We believe in this way of helping people help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: We promote prosperity across Europe, and thanks to Kiva now also beyond...

lenders.name: Mulder Family
lenders.occupational_info:
Chad works as a marketer.
Jodi is a part-time clinical social worker.
Levi plays & sings.
Judah is learning how to walk.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs succeed.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I want an investment that helps the world to be a better place
lenders.occupational_info: Texile manufacturing - management

lenders.name: Farzad
lenders.loan_because: I do this on behalf of my new baby boy. In a few years when my son is old enough to understand I want to use Kiva to teach him about helping others.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I care, and because it hurts to see the chasm between the way we live and the way people in developing countries are forced to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't work for money any more. I had a computer software and consultancy company that I sold to some mad Americans who paid me enough money I don't need to work for a living any more. So I went back to University and am now researching a Ph.D.

lenders.name: rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I have a very blessed life and want to share some of my good fortune to others who otherwise would not get the chance to succeed.  Everyone deserves a chance to be happy and feel worthy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a CAT scan technologist.  I take specialized x-rays of people.  My work keeps me grounded because everyday I see people who are very sick and still stay upbeat about life.  How could I not feel fortunate and blessed?

lenders.name: liquid
lenders.loan_because: money's just another word for nothing left to lose

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: It's my need to support, especially people in Africa.

lenders.name: adriana
lenders.loan_because: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, "What are you doing for others?"- Martin Luther King, Jr.
lenders.occupational_info: Shaping the lives of young children.

lenders.name: simi
lenders.loan_because: its simple... I CAN...

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Publisher of printed editions of classical choral, vocal, and keyboard music

lenders.name: Maranda
lenders.occupational_info: I go to Brevard College in hopes of becoming a painter.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to. It's so little money and time, there's no excuse not to!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently a student, but my goal is to graduate and work for a non-profit organization - hopefully doing some sort of humanitarian effort/disaster relief.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: We feel it is important to help others.  We love the Lord.  He commands that we care for the less fortunate.  A hand-up is far better than a hand-out!

lenders.name: Marcy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help anyone who is willing to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I help train people to do their jobs better.

lenders.name: Aleara
lenders.loan_because: I care and I want to help other people.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in redistributing the wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people turn their good intentions into action, by connecting people, ideas and resources. See idealist.org for more.

lenders.name: Lydia
lenders.occupational_info: Food writer and founder of nonprofit Drop In & Decorate: Cookies for Donation program.

lenders.name: Yolanta
lenders.loan_because: it's one of a very few direct options to help people less of....I hope that I can make small diffrence to somebody's life.

lenders.name: Murali
lenders.loan_because: I want more people in the world to have a better quality of life

lenders.name: Neighborhood Book Club
lenders.loan_because: we are a book club in New Jersey and we want to do something to make a difference in the world...even if just a bit.
lenders.occupational_info: we are a group of mostly mothers in ages ranging from 35 to 50ish and we read and talk about interesting books every month and were hoping to do something bigger than just talk about books.

lenders.name: Atterboms
lenders.loan_because: this is just an excellent idea!!

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It's important to me to help people improve their lives and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I review articles that will be published in medical journals.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: In my experience, there are a great deal of problems with traditional charity. External 'solutions' rarely are sustainable. Whereas Kiva gives them tools to improve their own lives as they see fit.
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to everyday people on behalf of companies. I also help make sense of their customers' needs. They then go away and, hopefully, improve their stuff to make customers happy.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: By caring for one another, the world's people become closer and the artificial walls we erect crumble. I have much, and so many others have so little; it is my way of paying it forward for a blessed life.

lenders.name: Mikaela
lenders.loan_because: I know that small acts can make a big difference.  Giving someone that jump start they need can work miracles and foster an entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people that have been hurt by other people.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I can and it feels good. Thanks Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a citizen of the developed world, a world which is wasteful, myopic, and greedy, who is trying to change that a little bit at a time.

lenders.name: Angelo
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying photography at a college in Virginia Beach, VA.

lenders.name: Ethan
lenders.loan_because: My grandma gave me a gift certificate

lenders.name: Kimihiko
lenders.loan_because: I want to help children go to school.

lenders.name: Cecil
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people that help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Kentucky I am studying Sustainable Agriculture, Community Development and leadership and Minoring in Agriculture Economics and Animal Science.

lenders.name: Georgia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people help themselves to fulfilling lives.  We all need a little help now and then.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise funds from corporations and foundations in support of educational research and scholarships, as well as other projects for faculty and students at the university.

lenders.name: LifeCoach Aps
lenders.loan_because: We believe that we, as world citizens, all have a joint responsibility for improving each others physical and spiritual living conditions. We really like the idea of having a direct insight in what our donations are spent on and that we can support the projects that in our opinion has the largest impact and the greatest chance of succeeding in terms of improving living conditions for the recipients and their families in generations to come.

lenders.name: Clem
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get the best deal on the things they need.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: Deut. 15:7-8, seems to sum it up.  We have been very blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I design electronic and computer systems, and provide consulting services to companies and organizations that do not have expertise on their staff.

lenders.name: 1st.Presbyterian Church
lenders.loan_because: Jesus told us to love our neighbors
lenders.occupational_info: We're members of a Christian church

lenders.name: Jim & Diane
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people better themselves.

lenders.name: Nate & Jen
lenders.loan_because: I want to support small business
lenders.occupational_info: We make high-quality, natural soap. Our unrefined shea butter comes from Ghana so we especially like to support their local economies.
